title: Callejon (D. Ventura de)
body: Spanish consul on the island of Madeira. He wrote a report about Columbus' stay on this island in the Ilustracion Espanola y Americana (n1. 38 of October 15, 1878).

Madeira: Island where D. Ventura de Callejon was the Spanish consul.

Colombo: Reference to Columbus' stay on the island of Madeira.

1878: Date of the report written by D. Ventura de Callejon about Columbus' stay on the island of Madeira.
